name: TRACHI: AUTONOMY
storyline:
On the 25th of August 1923, three operatives from the Ionian Intelligence Secretariat are about to enter the city-state of Trachi.

Four years later, millions of lives have been lost to a war that engulfs the entire continent.

In an isolated Sanatorium, a man expects a visitor.
Both have seen what happened, back then.

And soon enough, you'll see it, too.

Some people just can't help but bring misery on others.

Everyone has a secret.

And everyone has a blind spot somewhere.
summary:
A story-driven adventure about a city and three people that shouldn't be there.
Retrace the events of a tragedy through a disjointed narrative.
And see whether you can make out the true intentions of a people that so desperately try to hide their true intentions.
